content.question: When the Soviet Union successfully launched the first artificial satellite Sputnik in 1957, Congress responded by

choices.label: ending diplomatic relations with the Soviet Union
passing the National Defense Education Act
passing Title IX of the Federal Education Amendments
proposing the Strategic Arms Limitation Treaty

content.answer: passing the National Defense Education Act

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
